text: @realDonaldTrump I must say, never have i ever felt the need to go out and get a gun license and a gun, until I saw the way you pushed to invocy the insurrection act. I'm from the hood in Chicago, and never have i felt so threatened by my own government. You are a virus more deadly than COVID19.
